acupoints.name: Spirit Gate
acupoints.location_hint: Ulnar side of wrist crease in small depression
acupoints.notes: Calms shen; classic for sleep and anxiety.

acupoints.name: Three Yin Intersection
acupoints.location_hint: Medial lower leg, ~3 cun above medial malleolus
acupoints.notes: Crossing point of SP/KI/LV; nourishes yin; avoid in pregnancy.

acupoints.name: Bubbling Spring
acupoints.location_hint: Sole, depression just below ball of foot
acupoints.notes: Grounding point; used to descend excess yang.

acupoints.name: Inner Frontier Gate
acupoints.location_hint: Inner forearm, ~3 finger-breadths above wrist crease
acupoints.notes: Settles chest; useful for palpitations/anxiety-related insomnia.

acupoints.name: Wind Pool
acupoints.location_hint: Base of skull, in hollows lateral to tendons
acupoints.notes: Releases wind; sometimes used to relax neck and aid sleep.

disclaimer: For educational reference only. Not medical advice or a substitute for professional care.
